constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 66 (Friday, April 16, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. CONNOLLY:
H.R. 2617.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8 of the United States Constitution.
[Page H1891]

notes.text: The Joint Explanatory Statement and text to accompany Public Law 117-328 are found within Book 1 (Divisions A-F), Book 2 (Divisions G-N)

title: Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2023
